Comments
March 5, 2022
AdamWarlock
The dial isn't fancy or innovative, but it brings a surprising amount of value for a bargain cost. 6 clicks of life, 3 with invulnerability, makes her VERY durable for the cost. She's taxi, tie-up and aggressor all in one. I think the "boring" design will have people underestimating her.
January 18, 2022
Goop
Your basic blades+exploit piece. Not bad but nothing really that interesting either. Stats are all average too.
January 15, 2022
Hellboy the Bellboy
The dial is fine but feels too generic to be Angela.
